data.name: AbuCompressedAirTitle
data.value: 4.4. Compressed air

data.name: AbuCompressedAirValue1
data.value: Compressed air consumption per one ABU does not exceed 80 nm<sup>3</sup>/h.

data.name: AbuCompressedAirValue2
data.value: Air pipeline with a Ду 15 mm valve shall supply the compressed air to the ABU.

data.name: AbuCompressedAirValue2.1
data.value: Compressed air requirements:

data.name: AbuCompressedAirValue2.2
data.value: pressure - 2-7 atm.

data.name: AbuCompressedAirValue2.3
data.value: suspended substances, - 10 mg/m<sup>3</sup> max

data.name: AbuCompressedAirValue2.4
data.value: moisture content - no requirements.

data.name: AbuCompressedAirValue3
data.value: The manifold valve, Ду 15mm, shall be installed at the ABU connection to the local network.

data.name: AbuCompressedAirValue4
data.value: A suitable valve for an air supply point is supplied, except for the manifold valve.

data.name: AbuCompressedAirValue5
data.value: Compressed air shall be supplied in twenty-four-hour mode. A maximum of 2 hours is allowed for compressed air to be absent. Absence of compressed air for more than 2 hours is a contingency situation. The procedure for such a situation is described in the ABU passport.

data.name: AbuDimensions
data.value: 1. ABU-{0} technical characteristics and overall dimensions

data.name: AbuElectricalConsumptionTitle
data.value: 2. Consumables and electricity consumption

data.name: AbuElectricalConsumptionValue1
data.value: installed power - {0} kW, including the ventilator - {1} kW

data.name: AbuElectricalConsumptionValue2
data.value: industrial water for compensatory feeding, depending on the temperature and humidity of the air to be cleaned - {0} m<sup>3</sup>/day max (to compensate for loss in humidity of the ventilation air during operation)

data.name: AbuElectricalConsumptionValue3
data.value: compressed air (the unit can be equipped with an autonomous blower) - {0} Nm<sup>3</sup>/h max, pressure - 0.2-0.7 MPa

data.name: AbuElectricalConsumptionValue4
data.value: biogenic additives - {0} kg/year. (Complex agricultural fertilizers containing ammonium, phosphate and potassium ions are used as biogenic additives.)

data.name: AbuElectricityTitle
data.value: 4.2 Power supply

data.name: AbuElectricityValue1
data.value: Specifications of power consumers:

data.name: AbuElectricityValue1.1
data.value: ventilator motor (1 pc., 380 V, {0} kW);

data.name: AbuElectricityValue1.2
data.value: water pump engines (1 pc., 380 V, {0} kW);

data.name: AbuElectricityValue1.3
data.value: sludge pump engines (1 pc., 380 V, {0} kW);

data.name: AbuElectricityValue1.4
data.value: electric valve drives (9 pcs., 220 V, 100 W);

data.name: AbuElectricityValue1.5
data.value: level sensors (3 pcs., 6 V)

data.name: AbuElectricityValue1.6
data.value: Power cables, cable trays and control cables are supplied with ABUs.

data.name: AbuElectricityValue2
data.value: Control cabinets are supplied with the ABU.

data.name: AbuElectricityValue3
data.value: Wiring needs to be arranged for power circuits from the workshop transformer to ABU control cabinets.

data.name: AbuElectricityValue4
data.value: The electrical and starting equipment of the ventilator and pump must be installed in accordance with the «Electrical installation rules» and in places that allow monitoring of the electric units.

data.name: AbuElectricityValue5
data.value: A grounding bus needs to be arranged for all non-conducting parts of the ABU equipment.

data.name: AbuInstallationTitle1
data.value: 4. Basic data for ABU-{0} installation

data.name: AbuInstallationTitle2
data.value: 4.1. Structural design and requirements to the premise for ABU installation

data.name: AbuInstallationValue1
data.value: Concrete floor at the mark of 0.000 for placement of ABU equipment. The floor needs to be levelled. The concrete thickness depends on the projected ABU loads. The ABU equipment is installed on two frames.

data.name: AbuInstallationValue2
data.value: Max load on one frame is {0} tons.

data.name: AbuInstallationValue3
data.value: The equipment does not need to be attached to the floor.

data.name: AbuInstallationValue4
data.value: Emergency draining traps for occasional spills of the absorbent in the concrete floor structure. Traps shall be connected to the workshop sewerage.

data.name: AbuInstallationValue4.1
data.value: The volume of occasional spills does not exceed 8 m<sup>3</sup> per one accident. An «accident» means a vessel body leakage or valves leakage.

data.name: AbuInstallationValue5
data.value: Hoisting mechanisms are not required for ABU maintenance.

data.name: AbuInstallationValue6
data.value: Ambient temperature in the ABU installation room: at least 5°C in the coldest month. Maximum temperature in the ABU installation room shall be 30°C.

data.name: AbuInstallationValue7
data.value: In terms of explosion and fire safety, the ABU installation room belongs to the lowest category - D (there are cold incombustible substances and materials, combustible and hard-combustible substances and materials in the room, in such quantities that the specific fire load does not exceed 100 mJ/m<sup>2</sup> in their locations, and the fire load in the room is below 1000 mJ).

data.name: AbuLifespanTitle
data.value: 5. Life cycle

data.name: AbuLifespanValue
data.value: Service cycle is at least 15 years.

data.name: AbuMaintenanceTitle
data.value: 3. Maintenance of ABU-{0}

data.name: AbuMaintenanceValue
data.value: Maintenance of an ABU is limited to removal of suspended and condensing substances from the sludge basket and maintaining the necessary content of phosphorus, nitrogen and potassium in the absorbent by supplying biogenic additives (BA). To determine if BAs need to be added to the absorbent, it is recommended to measure the content of phosphorus, nitrogen and potassium once a month. The efficiency of absorbent regeneration by destructing microorganisms is monitored by an indirect indicator - chemical oxygen consumption (COC), which is recommended to be determined once a month.

data.name: AbuPhenolEfficiencyTitle
data.value: Efficiency of capturing phenol, formaldehyde:

data.name: AbuPhenolEfficiencyValue
data.value: At least {0}, with an input concentration of {1} mg/m<sup>3</sup>

data.name: AbuSpecTitle
data.value: Technical characteristics and basic data

data.name: AbutDrainageTitle
data.value: Composition of the substances to be drained:

data.name: AbutDrainageValue1
data.value: phosphate content - 150 mg/l max

data.name: AbutDrainageValue2
data.value: Content of nitrates - 200 mg/l max

data.name: AbutDrainageValue3
data.value: The pH value is 6.5-8.3

data.name: AbutDrainageValue4
data.value: Chemical oxygen consumption (COC) - 6,000 mgO<sub>2</sub>/l max

data.name: AbutDrainageValue5
data.value: Suspended substances - 0.1% max by volume, and particle size - 0.2 mm max

data.name: AbuTitle
data.value: Absorption-Biological Unit (ABU) for purification of industrial ventilation air with a capacity of {0} thousand m<sup>3</sup>/h (ABU-{1})

data.name: AbuTriethylamineEfficiencyTitle
data.value: Efficiency of removing triethylamine and suspended substances is 96 - 98% (triethylamine output concentration does not exceed 20 mg/m<sup>3</sup>)

data.name: AbuTriethylamineEfficiencyValue1
data.value: Efficiency of capturing suspended substances - at least 98%

data.name: AbuTriethylamineEfficiencyValue2
data.value: ventilation network resistance is 1700 Pa max

data.name: AbuTriethylamineEfficiencyValue3
data.value: hydraulic resistance (ABU’s pressure loss) is 2400 Pa max

data.name: AbuTriethylamineEfficiencyValue4
data.value: temperature in the room intended for ABU installation is +5 ... +30°C

data.name: AbuTriethylamineEfficiencyValue5
data.value: overall dimensions, L \ W \ H: {0}x{1}x{2} mm. (when being installed as a single unit).

data.name: AbuVentilationTitle
data.value: 4.5. Ventilation

data.name: AbuVentilationValue1
data.value: Air ducts need to supply air from the ventilation hoods of the equipment to the ABU, and then from the ventilators exhausts to the atmospheric air.

data.name: AbuVentilationValue1.1
data.value: The class of air duct structure on the rarefaction line is «N» (normal) class.

data.name: AbuVentilationValue1.2
data.value: The class of air duct structure on the pressure line (after the ventilators) is «N» (normal) class.

data.name: AbuVentilationValue1.3
data.value: Flexible inserts for the ventilator input and output are supplied with the ABU.

data.name: AbuVentilationValue2
data.value: The thrust actuator is a {0} ventilator with the following characteristics:

data.name: AbuVentilationValue2.1
data.value: engine {0} kW, 380/660V, 50Hz, {1} rpm

data.name: AbuVentilationValue2.2
data.value: the ventilator is made of carbon steel with a powder coating

data.name: AbuVentilationValue2.3
data.value: ventilator impeller rotation speed - {0} rpm

data.name: AbuVentilationValue2.4
data.value: The noise level from {0} fan is 113 dB

data.name: AbuVentilationValue2.5
data.value: It is possible to use a thrust actuator from a different manufacturer and with different characteristics.

data.name: AbuVentilationValue3
data.value: The rarefaction pressure at the ABU inlet fitting is below 1200 Pa, the delivery pressure on the exhaust connection shall not exceed +500 Pa.

data.name: AbuVentilationValue4
data.value: Shutter closing needs to be arranged on the ducts, in the area of enclosures, to regulate the aspiration air leakage. Fittings counter flanges for the inlet and exhaust areas are supplied with ABUs.

data.name: AbuVentilationValue4.1
data.value: General exchange ventilation with an air exchange rate of 3-4 need to be arranged in the ABU installation room.

data.name: AbuWaterSupplyTitle
data.value: 4.3. Water supply

data.name: AbuWaterSupplyValue1
data.value: Provide for industrial water supply to ABU Ду 20 fitting for a one-time filling of the tanks (about 20 m<sup>3</sup>) when the ABU is started.

data.name: AbuWaterSupplyValue2
data.value: Compensatory water consumption by the ABU - 2.0 m<sup>3</sup>/day max.

data.name: AbuWaterSupplyValue3
data.value: Requirements for industrial water to be used as additional feeding:

data.name: AbuWaterSupplyValue3.1
data.value: pressure - 0.2-0.6 MPa;

data.name: AbuWaterSupplyValue3.2
data.value: mechanical impurities content - 0.1% max by volume, particle size - 0.2 mm max;

data.name: AbuWaterSupplyValue3.3
data.value: temperature - 5-30°С

data.name: AbuWaterSupplyValue3.4
data.value: The ABU needs to be connected to the local water supply system through the manifold valve Ду 20mm.

data.name: AbuWaterSupplyValue4
data.value: A suitable valve for a water feed point is supplied, except for the manifold valve.

data.name: AbuWaterSupplyValue5
data.value: With the ABU absorption system running (pump and ventilator are ON), service water intended for compensatory supply can be absent for 2 hours max. If the absorption system is not running (pump and ventilator are OFF), additional supply of water is not required.
